improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero may occur in this line.  The variable x is decremented in a loop until it reaches 0. Then, the program attempts to divide 1 by x (which is 0). Consider adding a check to ensure x is not 0 before performing the division.
Unreachable code. The loop runs until x becomes 0. The code after the loop will always execute.  Consider restructuring the code to handle the case where x might become 0.
The variable y is assigned the value 0 and is never used before the division, leading to a potential division by zero error.
